unnormalised: Boro, konnem Mumbai-ant real estate investment-ache vixim vicharle, baro? Mhaka sangta, tem ekdom vaitt anubhav! Hanv Andheri West-ant, Lokhandwala-chea azubazuk ek 2BHK sodtale, ani tannem mhaka Rs. 2.5 Cr sanglle. Tem 25,000,000 Rupai! Gambhirpanan, poishe koddcheun yetat? Ani, stamp duty extra asa, sumarak 5% agreement value-chea vo kitem-tornui. Mazo ixtt Deepak-an Panvel-ant ek plot ghetla, Mumbai-chea thode bhair, Rs. 50 lakhs-ak, punn to sangta ki tem 5 vorsham-ant double zatlem. Devo dakhoun, tem zata ki na?
normalised: Bore, konnain Mumbai-ntli real estate investment vixim vicharlem, barem? Hanv tumkam sangtam, tem ek bhiranticho pravas! Hanv Andheri West-ant don B H K gheunk sodtalom, Lokhandwala-chea aspas, ani tea monxan mhaka don point panch crore rupiya sanglle. Tech panchvis million rupiya! Gambhirponnan, poiso khanchaun yeta? Ani stamp duty extra asa, sumar agreement value-che panch percent vo kitem tori. Mhojea ixttan Deepak-an Panvel-ant ek plot ghetla, Mumbai-chea bhair thoddeach duren, panchveas lakh rupiya-nk, punn to sangta ki to panch vorsant doble zatlo. Polleunche poddle tem ghoddta mhunn, barem?

unnormalised: Ani tumchea lagim bank-ache EMI-chea vixim asa. HDFC offer karta, sumarak, 8.75% interest atam. Mhonnlear, zaka mhonnllem, Rs. 1 Cr-acho loan ghetlear, tum ogrom amount bhortat 20 vorsham-ant. Bhienkar asa! Ani, property tax visar nakat! BMC (Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation) tumkam bill dhaddteli dar vorsa, ani tem ek lhan amount nhoi. Area ani property-chea size-ancher aslelem, punn thode hazar Rs. diunk toyar ravonk zai.
normalised: Uprant tuka bank-an E-M-I xit asa. H-D-F-C offer korta, sumar atth point sat panch percent interest atam dita. Tech, tum ek crore rupiyanchem loan gheta, tum vis vorsank ek vhodd chodd dita. Tem bhirantichem! Ani property tax visrunk naka! B-M-C (Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation) tuka dor vorsak ek bill dhaddteli, ani ti thoddi rokkm nhoi. Zageacher ani property-chea akaracher depend asa, punn sumar kaim hazar rupiya kaddunk toyar ravat.

unnormalised: Dusrem vichar korunk asa tem carpet area vs. built-up area. Builder tumkam ek ogrom number dakhoupa, sumarak 1000 sq ft, punn aslolo vapracho space matren 700 sq ft astolo. Tannim balconies, walls, sogllem melloun ghetat! Soddanch carpet area certificate vicharat; tem ekuch marg asa khatrek. Ani, RERA tumcho ixtt asa. Check korat project RERA-approved asa ki na scams avoid korunk.
normalised: Anik ek vostu ji vichar korunk zata ti carpet area versus built-up area. Builder tuka ek vhodd ankddo dakhoitolo, sumar ek hazar square feet, punn vostvik vaprunk mellpi zago fokot satxim square feet zatlo. Te balconies, divo ani soglle add kortat! Carpet area certificate sodanch magat; tech ek chuk naslolo marg zanna zaunk. Ani R-E-R-A tumcho ixtt. Project R-E-R-A-approved asa vo na te polleiat ghotalo tallunk.

unnormalised: Nimannem, Mumbai real estate-ant invest korop ek motto nirnnoy asa. Tumchem homework korat, ek financial advisor-ak vicharat, ani tea "super deal" ads-anchea hatak lagun vochonakat. Soddanch chhaplele sobit aksharant vachat kitem-tornui sign korchea poilim, khas korun hidden costs-ache vixim clauses-acher, zaka sadharanponnan 2-3% additional astolem overall cost-acher. Subh vagddi, ani tumchea property-achi value soddanch vokhannaunk pavonkat!
normalised: Nidant, Mumbai-ntli real estate-ant investment korop ek vhodd nirnnoy. Tumchem homework korat, ek financial advisor-acho sallo gheiat, ani tim "super deal" ads dakoitat tacher bholun vochonaakat. Kitem-i sign korche adim nimnne xer borobor vachat, khas korun hidden costs vixim clauses-am vixim, je sumar don te tin percent atrik axa ekunk khorchacher. Tumkam bore zatolem, ani tumche property-chi kimot voir vochot mhunn!
